item.title: Optimizing Latency
item.description:
Description

Any growing startup will at some point face the problem of making their product work fast enough to provide a good user experience. At Desti, we had to get our search from taking multiple seconds to an average of 300ms. To achieve that goal, we developed a tool and methodology for measurement, and employed multiple techniques of optimization. We improved our architecture, system design, and implementation before reaching that goal. In this talk, Iâ€™ll share our measurement tool and methodology, and the optimization techniques we used.

Slides available here: http://il.pycon.org/2016/static/sessions/imri-goldberg.pdf
item.dc:creator: Imri Goldberg
